# Google Cloud Function

Provision Google Cloud Function
<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (TOC) -->
- [Input Types](#input-types)
- [Output Types](#output-types)
- [Example](#example)
<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (COMPONENT_INPUT_TYPES) -->
## Input Types
| Name | Type | Description |
|:------ |:-----|:-----------------|
| **entryPoint**| `string`<br/>*required* | The name of the function (as defined in source code) that will be executed. Defaults to the resource name suffix, if not specified. For backward compatibility, if function with given name is not found, then the system will try to use function named "function". For Node.js this is name of a function exported by the module specified in source_location.
| **keyFilename**| `string`<br/>*required* | The Google Cloud Function credentials filename
| **locationId**| `string`<br/>*required* | The Google Cloud Function location id
| **projectId**| `string`<br/>*required* | The Google Cloud Function project id
| **sourceCodePath**| `string`<br/>*required* | Path to source code
| **runtime**| `string`<br/>*required* | Runtime for the function. If empty, defaults to nodejs6<br/>Possible values are java8, nodejs6, nodejs8, python2.7, python3.6 and dotnetcore1.0<br/>
| **sourceUploadUrl**| `string` | The Google Cloud Storage signed URL used for source uploading, generated by [google.cloud.functions.v1.GenerateUploadUrl][].
| **name**| `string`<br/>*required* | The Google Cloud Function name. Function names must be unique globally and match pattern projects/*/locations/*/functions/*
| **deploymentBucket**| `string`<br/>*required* | The name of the Google Storage bucket name where the function code is deployed
| **sourceRepository**| `object` | The source repository where a function is hosted. Of type '[sourceRepository](https://cloud.google.com/functions/docs/reference/rest/v1/projects.locations.functions#SourceRepository)'
| **description**| `string` | A short, user-defined function description
| **httpsTrigger**| `object` | An HTTPS endpoint type of source that can be triggered via URL. Of type '[HttpsTrigger](https://cloud.google.com/functions/docs/reference/rest/v1/projects.locations.functions#HttpsTrigger)'.
| **eventTrigger**| `object` | A source that fires events in response to a condition in another service. Of type '[EventTrigger](https://cloud.google.com/functions/docs/reference/rest/v1/projects.locations.functions#EventTrigger)'.
| **sourceArchiveUrl**| `string` | The Google Cloud Storage URL, starting with gs://, pointing to the zip archive which contains the function.
| **labels**| `object` | Labels associated with this Google Cloud Function. An object containing a list of key/value pairs.
| **availableMemoryMb**| `number` | The amount of memory in MB available for a function. Defaults to 256MB.
| **timeout**| `string` | The Google Cloud Function execution timeout. Execution is considered failed and can be terminated if the function is not completed at the end of the timeout period. Defaults to 60 seconds. A duration in seconds with up to nine fractional digits, terminated by 's'.
| **environmentVariables**| `object` | Google Cloud function's environment configuration settings

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (COMPONENT_OUTPUT_TYPES) -->
## Output Types
| Name | Type | Description |
|:------ |:-----|:-----------------|
| **name**| `string` | The Google Cloud Function name. Function names must be unique globally and match pattern projects/*/locations/*/functions/*
| **serviceAccountEmail**| `string` | The email of the Google Cloud Function's service account.
| **updateTime**| `string` | The last updated timestamp of a Google Cloud Function in 'Timestamp' format. A timestamp in RFC3339 UTC "Zulu" format, accurate to nanoseconds, e.g. "2014-10-02T15:01:23.045123456Z".
| **versionId**| `string` | The version identifier of the Google Cloud Function in 'int64' format. Each deployment attempt results in a new version of a function being created.
| **entryPoint**| `string` | The name of the function (as defined in source code) that will be executed. Defaults to the resource name suffix, if not specified. For backward compatibility, if function with given name is not found, then the system will try to use function named "function". For Node.js this is name of a function exported by the module specified in source_location.
| **status**| `string` | The status of the Google Cloud function of type enum 'CloudFunctionStatus'.
| **availableMemoryMb**| `number` | The amount of memory in MB available for a function.
| **runtime**| `string` | Runtime for the function.
| **sourceArchiveFilename**| `string` | The filename of source code archive zip file.
| **sourceArchiveUrl**| `string` | The Google Cloud Storage URL, starting with gs://, pointing to the zip archive which contains the function.
| **httpsTrigger**| `object` | An HTTPS endpoint type of source that can be triggered via URL, of type 'HttpsTrigger'. The 'url' attribute is the deployed url for the function.
| **timeout**| `string` | The Google Cloud Function execution timeout. Execution is considered failed and can be terminated if the function is not completed at the end of the timeout period. Defaults to 60 seconds. A duration in seconds with up to nine fractional digits, terminated by 's'.

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (COMPONENT_EXAMPLES) -->
## Example
```yml
type: my-application
components:
  myGoogleCloudFunction:
    type: google-cloud-function
    inputs:
      entryPoint: helloworld
      keyFilename: ~/.gcloud/keyfile.json
      locationId: us-east1
      sourceCodePath: '${self.path}/code'
      sourceRepository:
        url: string
        deployedUrl: string
      httpsTrigger:
        url: string
      eventTrigger:
        eventType: string
        resource: string
        service: string
        failurePolicy:
          object(FailurePolicy): null
      labels:
        name: wrench
        mass: 1.3kg
        count: '3'
      availableMemoryMb: 256
      timeout: 3.5s

```
<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->
